Robot Johnny

Javascript is used in front end development, but the range of usage options does not end there. I was inspired by the website called Johnny-five. I decided to use my skills to create a micro project showing an unconventional useage of Javascript. I made a little waving robot runnig on Javascript, loaded through Node.js and npm to the Arduino Leonardo microchip controler.

http://johnny-five.io/
